On reform Implementation: Progress appeares to be lower in competition-Enhancing police (Products & Services markets) and in Taxation #ECOFIN
It ENHANCE Europe's Growth Potential and Prevent Future Crises, we must address the structural weaknesses of our Economies. #ECOFIN

The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of President Dilma during delivery of houses of #MinhaCasaMinhaVida, in RJ.
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo President @dilmabr addresses the #MCMV delivery ceremony in Rio de Janeiro. Follow: http://t.co/4GQgXm6rVE
Perhaps the most important achievement of a family throughout life is to have a home to settle down and dream about the future. #My home, my life
As important as the house itself is the education of children, children. #My home, my life
We are building conditions so that the population of that country has a better life, that people are treated with equal opportunities.
It is very important the participation of mov. housing in the construction of housing. I acknowledge the great contribution of the public.
We want people to have access to their own home. In 2018, the goal is that around 27 million Brazilians have had access to #MCMV
I was pleased today to meet with the media leaders and icons in the region during the opening of the Arab Media Forum http://t.co/9gNBbcRg7g
These are not house constructions, but constructions of life. We give and we will take bold steps to look at the problem of access to own house
Our country will always be a platform for constructive dialogue and positive and effective momentum in development
My remarks after the meeting with President of #Georgia @MargvelashviliG http://t.co/cDWkhTWKNg http://t.co/T00j0Y12DJ
I reaffirm a commitment: I and my government are committed to living here in Rio de Janeiro. #My home, my life
We have to congratulate Rio de Janeiro, who will receive the most important Olympics that the world has ever seen. # Rio2016
